content: toe-up slip-stitch heel sock formula for 2 circs keep in mind that this is a formula - you have to plug in your own desired stitch count to make it work plus there is a lot of assumed knowledge in this formula in regards to working socks on 2 circulars and doing increases and decreases this isn t a good pattern for beginning sock knitters co between 8 and 12 sts depending on gauge and your personal preferences per needle using your favorite toe-up cast on i prefer judy s magic cast on and increase at the beg and end of each needle every row 3 or 4 times then every other row until you arrive at your desired total # of sts t the number of sts per needle = n or n=t/2 work even to 3 less than desired foot length from cast on edge increase for gusset designate one needle as heel needle and one needle as instep needle instep needle will be left alone and never has any change in st count on heel needle k1 increase use your preferred method k to last st increase k1 k across instep k 1 round plain repeat these last 2 row until you have n+20 on your heel needle - this is your gusset # g turn heel you will now work back and forth on the heel needle only reminders row 1 k g/2 + 8 m1 k1 w&t t=total # sts around row 2 p18 m1p p1 w&t row 3 k16 m1 k1 w&t n=t/2 row 4 p14 m1p p1 w&t g=n+20 row 5 k12 m1 k1 w&t h=n+28 row 6 p10 m1p p1 w&t row 7 k8 m1 k1 w&t row 8 p6 m1p p1 w&t you have now turned the heel h and h = n+28 k most of one round by knitting across the rest of the heel and across the instep pick up the wraps and knit them together with their sts as you come to them heel flap working back and forth on heel needle only again row 1 k h/2 + n/2-1 ssk turn as you work across this first heel row continue picking up remaining wraps and k them decrease with their sts row 2 sl 1 p n-2 p2tog turn row 3 sl 1 * k1 sl 1 repeat from * to 1 st before gap created by last turn ssk turn repeat row 2 and 3 until all heel sts but 1 have been decreased away on last row don t turn and instead continue in the round by knitting across the instep and then k2tog at the beginning of the heel needle to eliminate this last st you re done with the thinking part now just continue even to your desired leg length and finish with the cuff of your choice don t forget that binding off on toe-up socks can be tricky -
